Summary Note:
Herrmann Schmitt Klein and the RM met at a financial seminar in Berlin. They attended several workshops together and exchanged ideas on market trends, which sparked a long-term professional relationship.
With a career spanning nearly 34 years, Herrmann Schmitt Klein has established himself as a key player in the industry.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Herrmann Schmitt Klein has been happily married to Fabienne since 1994. Together they have 3 kids called Ida, Anna and Mia.
Education Background:
Herrmann completed his secondary education at Helmut-Schmidt-Gymnasium Hamburg in 1985.
He then attended Hamburg University of Applied Sciences, which he graduated in 1992.
Occupation History:
Herrmann Schmitt Klein is a 57 year old VP of Business Development from Germany. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Herrmann Schmitt Klein launched his career as a Aerospace Engineer at Airbus Operations GmbH, where he gained valuable experience from 1991 to 1994.
In 1996, he moved to RUAG Aerospace Services GmbH to work as a Program Manager, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
From 2000 to 2003, he served as a Director of Operations at MTU Aero Engines AG, solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
His next role was as a VP of Business Development at MTU Aero Engines AG, where he applied his extensive experience to drive innovation from 2005 till now.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 1060000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
He owns house in Bielefeld, where he resides. It is worth 1701000 EUR.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns flat in Hanover worth 850000 EUR.

Moreover, he has invested in additional property in Hanover, giving possiblity for generating additional income. The townhouse is valued at 1550000 EUR.

He inherited a significant sum of 710000 EUR from his mother, a respected Venture Capitalist, in 2014, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Herrmann as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
